about_the_game:
Crafting System

Gather materials and craft tools, items, and equipment for exploration or other tasks.

 Cooking Recipes

Collect ingredients and cook meals that restore hunger. From basic eating options to complex cooking recipes featuring mini game like mechanics.

 Open World Exploration

Discover Carden's vast and diverse landscapes at your own pace, uncovering its secrets and hidden locations.

Self-Discovery and Storytelling

Engage in a narrative-driven experience where your choices and interactions shape your journey.

Farming and Gardening

Cultivate crops and plants that can be used for cooking, crafting, or traded for other resources. Farming plots can be built and managed featuring mini game like mechanics.

Collecting and managing Resources

Search the island for food, supplies, resources and so much more to advance research and uncover the island's history.

Hidden Areas and Secrets

Explore off-the-beaten-path locations to discover hidden caves, ancient ruins, or rare resources.

Quest System

Take on a variety of quests from NPCs, ranging from simple fetch quests to complex multi-stage missions.

 Environmental Puzzles

Solve puzzles scattered across the island that unlock new areas or grant access to resources.

Fishing Mechanics

Fish in various bodies of water, each with unique species to collect.

 Digging for Treasure

Use a shovel to dig for buried treasures, fossils, and minerals that can be sold, used, or researched.

Axe and Pickaxe Tools

Utilise tools like axes and pickaxes to chop wood, mine minerals, and clear obstacles in the environment.

TNT and Explosives

Use TNT to clear large obstacles, open new paths, or uncover hidden areas in the more rugged parts of the island.

Trading with NPCs

Trade resources, items, and crafted goods with local NPCs to obtain rare materials and unique upgrades.

Shop Management

Operate a shop where you can sell crafted items, farm produce, or rare finds to visiting explorers and researchers.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (4th Gen or newer) Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus 645, AMD Radeon Pro 555X, or equivalent

name: Carden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 (minimum) and i7-8700K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 or newer
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure in Carden, transforming an abandoned mining town into a research oasis. Manage resources, guide research, and explore alongside an eccentric inventor. With quirky allies, restore the island’s beauty and turn it into a hub of discovery and innovation.
